msContents.summary: The Nālaṭiyār, complete text with commentary by Nālaṭitēvar (?) (some overlap with E3 Patumaṉār, but not corresponding to any of E1+2+3; Nālaṭittēvar is also mentioned in the colophon to TSM 56-1.64, but there is no commentary.) Ariel title page, ciṟappu pāyiram and colophon (date: 3rd April 1883(?); date Ariel 1760); chapter titles and pratīka-s.

nālaṭitēvar urai nūṟpāpāyiracciṟappu
vāṉiṭu villiṉ varalaṟiyā vāymaiyāṟ
kāṉilan tōyāk kaṭavuḷai – yāṉilañ
ceṉṉi yuṟavaṇaṅkic cērtumem muḷḷattu
muṉṉi yavaimuṭika veṉṟu ௳ 1 ௳ Found in the Uraippāyiram of the 1921 edition, p. 6, as kaṭavuḷ vāḻttu in the Kaḻakam edition, p.1, and in the Caracuvatimakāl edition, p. 12.
veḷḷāṉ marapukku vētameṉa
c cāṉṟōrka ḷellāruṅ kūṭi yeṭutturaittuc – collāynta nālaṭi ṉāṉūṟu naṉkiṉitā meṉmaṉattē cīlamuṭa ṉiṟkavē ceppu ௳ 2 ௳ Found in the Caracuvatimakāl edition, p. 1 (together with 2 further verses).
maṉṉaṉ vaḻutiyarkōṉ vaikaip pe
yarāṟṟi leṇṇi yirunāṉkō rāyiravar – uṉṉi yeḻutiyiṭu mēṭṭi letirē naṭanta paḻutilā nālaṭiyaip pār ௳ 3 ௳ Found in the Varalāṟu of the 1921 edition, p. 1.
paraṅkuṉ ṟorupaka mapparam paḷḷi yiruṅkuṉṟam pērā
cai yāṉai – yaruṅkuṉṟa meṉṟeṭṭu veṟpu meṭuttiyampa vallārkkuc ceṉṟeṭṭu mōviraivit tīṅku ௳ 4 ௳
eṇperuṅ kuṉṟat teṇṇāyira muṉivar paṇporuntap pāṭiyapā
ṉāṉūṟun taṇporunta nīretirkoṇ ṭōṭutalāl nīṉṟicaip pāmeṉṟitaṉaip pāretir koṇṭārpayaṉaip parattu ௳ 5 ௳ ciṟappuppāyiram muṟṟum ௳ civacuppiramaṇiyakaṭāṣcam
